author: fern
msg: - compile target not remove jar file
- war target now copies system.xml into web-inf
- deploy will copy the webapp into $TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/Xindice
( if you have TOMCAT_HOME set properly )
- you will still have to restart tomcat, but this should save some time
